entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [tvos][arm64][mono] Attempting USB tunnel between the port 56494 on the device and the port 56494 (44764) on the mac: 61 #99649
  • [API Proposal]: System.Globalization.CompareOptions.UseNLS #99646
  • [API Proposal]: SHAKE squeezing #99645
  • Undefined behavior when the number of function parameters and the number of arguments does not match #99644
  • Announcement: PR Merge on Green will be enforced from 3/19/2024 #99643
    9.0.0
  • WASM: dotnet-resources cache added to every path of a SPA #99642
  • Time out in Directed_3.0.1 work item #99638
  • Don't throw exception in ServiceDescriptor #99622
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21392: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #99621
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-26190 | Microsoft QUIC Denial of Service Vulnerability #99620
  • Test Crash: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH #99623
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding for UTF8 #99614
  • IXmlSerializable on a struct with a parameterless constructor throws an InvalidProgramException on Derserialize #99613
  • ILC crashes on x64, works on arm64 #99611
    9.0.0
  • `netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1.0-x64.rpm` cannot be installed on FIPS-enabled system #99610
  • mono_os_mutex_destroy: pthread_mutex_destroy failed with "Device or resource busy" #99609
  • Not all built assemblies have deterministic source paths #99594
  • ILLink rooting assemblies with forwarded types #99592
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/7/2024 9:14:14 PM #99616
  • Access violation (crashes the process) while writing EventSource events #99603
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24160.1] Freesql error: Ambiguous match found for 'System.TimeSpan System.TimeSpan FromSeconds(Int64)'. #99588
  • Event log shows 5011 for sharepoint IIS log after the CU #99581
  • AOT optimization #99580
  • HttpClient async calls not throwing TaskCanceledException on Android when token canceled #99568

Closed

  • ObservableGauge Tags Aren't Being Properly Passed to MeterListener #99629
  • New usage analyzer: warn on bad lambda capture #93331
  • Analyzer: Adjust code for numeric `IntPtr`. #72348
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint test failing with multithreaded build - `CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #81646
    9.0.0
  • Blazor C# Debugger doesn't hit C# breakpoint after calling async Javascript function #78475
    9.0.0
  • Q: Is building the CoreCLR runtime on Unix supported with FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE disabled? #99484
  • Create a user-friendly design for feature switches #82783
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute model for feature APIs #96859
    9.0.0
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object exception in NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() #93969
  • AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() crashes with NullReferenceException #99452
  • Add RIDs for Alpine 3.19 #96155
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Make `ElapsedEventArgs` constructor public #99635
  • Null dereference in forward subtitution #99540
  • Assertion failed 'addrClone != nullptr' #99551
    9.0.0
  • ILC fails with System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. #99409
  • PersianCalendarTests.IsLeapYear failing #98795
    9.0.0
  • ECDsa instance is not usable when private key is imported a second time #99605
    Future
  • Arm64: Implement SVE encodings #94549
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: offset is out of bounds #98630
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] HttpClientCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98201
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] InvokerCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98145
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience .NET Standard compatible #99598
  • When will Ubuntu 22.04 (aarch64) be supported? Can I use the Ubuntu 20.04 apt repository on Ubuntu 22.04? Is that kosher? #99572
  • Whats the difference between xamarin.gpg and mono-official-archive-keyring.gpg when using a linux apt repository? #99571
  • Proposal: Hide Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite #27997
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #99651
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always keep global symbols on ApplePlatforms #99650
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Port arm64 INLINE_GETTHREAD from NativeAOT #99648
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Guard ToolboxItem by a new feature switch #99647
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Use attributes for IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch #99641
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99640
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • Avoid OrderBy.ToArray/ToList overheads for length 1 #99639
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • [mono] CodeQL fix set #1 #99637
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough checks in fgNewBBbefore/after #99636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough restriction in fgOptimizeEmptyBlock #99634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • Add 0/null checks for various cases in the COM/dynamic VARIANT extensions #99631
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove assert when setting DOTNET_MaxVectorTBitwidth to 512 #99630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable edge checks throughout #99628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack walking for new eh 4 #99624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SpinLock class smaller #99618
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Fix firing dynamic method wrappers crash #99617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][mt] Add MT option to container configs #99615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][ws] Fix WebSocket state propagation delay in `ReceiveAsync` #99612
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99607
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Don't set ENABLE_WERROR in VMR CI build in mono.proj #99604
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct info value in crossgen2 #99602
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support DisableTlsResume switch on Windows as well #99593
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Do not allow DynamicCodeSupport=true for NativeAOT #99590
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix alignment for vector types #99589
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Disable NORETURN annotation on PROCAbort for Arm #99587
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99586
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99583
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.5
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99582
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.30
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #99626
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99606
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #99627
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Add fgRedirectTrueEdge, fgRedirectFalseEdge #99561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a parent check to the forward substitution tree walk #99546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `m_srcUseLclFld` and `m_dstUseLclFld` #99556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99461
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [docs] Update mono android debugging docs #99633
    needs-area-label
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #99625
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Use templated implementations of isValidImm methods #99574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Re-enable calendars tests on NativeAOT/ARM32 #99595
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use existing Range vectorized fill in Enumerable.OrderBy #99538
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser] WS cancelation fix #99522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fixed: null reference instead of assert on failed reflection in CookieExtensions #99309
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] drop managed keepalive from thread pool #99524
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Don't inline methods with the DoesNotReturn attribute in interp #99550
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Disable jiterp safepoints in single-threaded WASM #99558
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #99577
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.4
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #99578
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.18
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #99579
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.4
  • Move CodeQL config file to root #99575
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Evidence types to AcccessControl NETFramework Facade #99462
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.29
  • Enable most SDL-required C/C++ warnings #99470
    area-Infrastructure
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99569
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.4
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99567
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.18
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99570
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.29
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for Alpine 3.19 / 3.20 #99560
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix negative lookaround stack handling #99424
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add enums to Enumerable.Order implicitly stable check #99533
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: more likelihood checking #99541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve precision of the vectorized trig functions #99549
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Update boot.json manifest generation order #99525
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition #97159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99357
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Allow using VS to run host tests when libraries use different config #91873
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99563
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Show the VMR commit hash in dotnet --info #99482
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] Prevent `SignalRClientTests` fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99537
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • CI test #99281
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
